categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic

nodes.text: Zorek was a female Human citizen of the Eternal Empire living during the Galactic War. A member of the Knights of Zakuul, following the Coronation of Empress Vaylin she was hand-picked by her to join the new Horizon Guard. She was among the guards who accompanied the Empress and SCORPIO when they used subterfuge to initiate the assault on the Gravestone.

Honor Guard Zorek appears in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic. She was supposed to appear during Knights of the Eternal Throne Chapter III "Dark Reunions", but was replaced with Vella Zarkot. The two use the same character model and are identical in appearance.
